title: Justia Live Blogging from Google's I/O Conference
description: Google hosted its annual I/O developer conference at Shoreline Amphitheatre, just down the road from Justia’s headquarters in Mountain View. The conference typically covers all of the new products and developments that Google will be launching in the near future, and this year was no different. Nick, one of our engineers, attended the conference, as he has done since it began in 2007, and live blogged about it this year. In his series of posts, Nick discusses Google’s announcements on a number of topics, including AMP, HTTPS, structured data, and more.

list.title: Stand Out on Google Search Using Structured Data and Search Analytics
Future, Faster: Unlock the Power of Web Components with Polymer
From AMP to PWA: Progressive Web AMPs
Web Performance: Leveraging the Metrics That Most Affect User Experience
Getting the Green Lock: HTTPS Stories from the Field
Building Beautiful, Interactive AMP Pages for e-Commerce & Beyond
